biotools.summary: Predicts functions of cis-regulatory regions. Many coding genes are well annotated with their biological functions. Non-coding regions typically lack such annotation. It assigns biological meaning to a set of non-coding genomic regions by analyzing the annotations of the nearby genes.

bioschemas.name: GREAT
